      • withExecutor

        public O withExecutor(Executor executor)
        Description copied from interface: QueryOperation
        Specifies Executor that will be used for asynchronous execution. By default will be used SameThreadExecutor that will be the thread that calls ResultSetFuture.set() and it will be Datastax Driver internal thread. It is recommended to specify application thread pool executor for asynchronous calls.
        Specified by:
        withExecutor in interface QueryOperation<T,O extends QueryOperation<T,O>>
        Parameters:
        executor - Executor service
        Returns:
        this
